mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.user_email, n.title, n.content, n.views, n.created_at, n.updated_at, f.id AS file_id, f.origin_name AS file_origin_name, f.saved_name AS file_saved_name, f.path AS file_path, f.type AS file_type, f.notice_id AS file_notice_id FROM notices n LEFT JOIN files f ON n.id = f.notice_id WHERE n.id = #{id}
